de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids

Interface DBIDs

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<DBID>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArrayDBIDs, ArrayModifiableDBIDs, ArrayStaticDBIDs, DBID, DBIDRange, HashSetDBIDs, HashSetModifiableDBIDs, ModifiableDBIDs, SetDBIDs, StaticDBIDs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyDBIDs, GenericArrayModifiableDBIDs, GenericHashSetModifiableDBIDs, IntegerArrayStaticDBIDs, IntegerDBID, IntegerDBIDRange, KNNUtil.DBIDView, MaskedDBIDs, MergedDBIDs, TroveArrayDBIDs, TroveArrayModifiableDBIDs, TroveArrayStaticDBIDs, TroveHashSetModifiableDBIDs, UnmodifiableDBIDs

    public interface DBIDs
extends Iterable<DBID>
    Interface for a collection of database references (IDs).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(DBID o)
      Test whether an ID is contained.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Test for an empty DBID collection.

      Get a DBIDIterator (a more efficient API).

      Retrieve Iterator access to the IDs.

      Retrieve the collection / data size.
